name: places/ChIJ-TDhnbxYwokRzGdx1byXRc4
formattedAddress: 201 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 201 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
I am a new resident to The Colorado and have been very happy so far.  The building is well managed and the amenity areas are always clean.

The staff (doorman, maintenance, management, etc) are all excellent and very personable.  You can feel the community/family vibe throughout the building.

I would refer living at The Colorado to anyone I know. 10/10

text.text:
I am a new resident to The Colorado and have been very happy so far.  The building is well managed and the amenity areas are always clean.

The staff (doorman, maintenance, management, etc) are all excellent and very personable.  You can feel the community/family vibe throughout the building.

I would refer living at The Colorado to anyone I know. 10/10

originalText.text: I’ve lived in three buildings in the city and this is far and away the best one. The doormen feel like family, the roof is incredible (the grills up there make all the difference and it’s indoor-outdoor), the gym is fully stocked and has Pelotons, there’s a great lounge for work from home and the management staff truly have everyone’s best interests at heart. Most of the doormen have been around in the building for decades. Anthony in particular, the lead doorman, is the best of the best. He’s like the dad everyone wishes they had and he’d do anything for you. Hector and the other maintenance stuff fix things within minutes, literally, and are always supportive. There’s also a Valet service in the basement that provides amazing tailoring and dry cleaning. The woman who runs it could not be nicer!! I don’t have kids, but it seems like all the kids programming they offer and the kids room are a huge hit and keep all the families in the building happy. It can be really hard to find a place that truly feels like home in NY and the staff at the Colorado actually make me feel like wanting to come home. It’s a really safe building and the location is convenient for quick grab and go food and some nice sit down restaurants. Lastly, I wanted to reiterate that it’s very hard to find good management companies in the city, and this one is top notch. Arianna especially would always say hi to me in the building, respond promptly to my emails, provide support on any financial questions and was great to work with when we were signing our lease / moving in. I can no longer afford the building now that COVID pricing is over and I’ve never been more sad to leave a place. This is literally my second Google review ever which shows how genuinely I want people to know that this place is worth the money. Hope this review helps!

originalText.text: Great location and great staff! Amenities are lovely and readily available. We loved our experience there!!

text.text: Great location and great staff! Amenities are lovely and readily available. We loved our experience there!!

originalText.text: Love the Colorado.  We recently moved in the building from one apartment to another.  Everyone (leasing, doormen and porters) was amazing at making the move easy!

text.text: Love the Colorado.  We recently moved in the building from one apartment to another.  Everyone (leasing, doormen and porters) was amazing at making the move easy!

originalText.text: They were parked outside our apartment and smelled amazing, decided to go down and they said they were closed but would hook me up, great food 10/10
